alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Grainger; Hancock (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 3:47PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Claiborne, western Hancock and northeastern Grainger Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 447 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tazewell, or 10 miles north of Rutledge, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rutledge, New Tazewell, Bean Station, Tazewell, Howard Quarter, Thorn Hill and Evanston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
